name: Kakupuri
description:
Kakupuri ia a 3D Local Multiplayer Game about two little members of the Kakupuri tribe. Together they must solve all the challenges on their way to a destiny together

Input:

1st Player (red character) Use Keyboard:

                  -Press Enter to join game

                  - WASD for Movement 

                  - Shift+Z for pushing

                  - Shift-X for pulling

                  - M to use Magic near Special Cubes (destroys the ones with crystal)

                  - P for Pause

2nd Player (green character) Use Gamepad:

                  - start button to join game

                  - Directional keys + Joystick for Movement

                  - Face Button right for Pushing

                  -  Face Button Left For for Pulling

                  - face button Top to use Magic near Special Cubes ( reconstructs the ones with a crystal)

                  - start to join game and pause
